pageContext.claim: “You have a mayor who has done a terrible job in London. He has done a terrible job. Take a look at the terrorism that is taking place. Look at what is going on in London. I think he has done a very bad job on terrorism. I think he has done a bad job on crime, if you look, all of the horrible things going on there, with all of the crime that is being brought in.”
pageContext.analysis: Terrorist incidents in London are at historic lows, despite a spike in 2017, according to the Economist.
